user.title: Add Huerizon Sky Sync
user.description: Click Submit to add Huerizon, then open Configure to pick camera and lights.

init.title: Huerizon Options
init.description: Choose how to read sky color data and which lights to sync.

data_description.source_camera: Optional camera entity for sky images.
data_description.target_lights: Select the lights that will receive updates from your sky data source.
data_description.input_format: Select the color format that your source provides (XY, HS, RGB, or Color Temperature).
data_description.hue_scale: How hue values are scaled by your source (auto, 0–360, 0–255, or 0–1).
data_description.percent_scale: How saturation/brightness values are scaled by your source (auto, 0–100, 0–255, or 0–1).
data_description.apply_mode: Choose whether to prioritize XY, HS, or Color Temp when a light supports multiple modes.
data_description.only_at_night: Enable syncing only when the sun is below the horizon.
data_description.active_start: Start time for active syncing period (HH:MM:SS).
data_description.active_end: End time for active syncing period (HH:MM:SS).
data_description.active_days: Days of the week when syncing should be active.
data_description.min_delta: Ignore small color changes below this threshold.
data_description.rate_limit_sec: Minimum seconds between updates to lights.

data_description.x_entity: Entity providing the X color coordinate.
data_description.y_entity: Entity providing the Y color coordinate.

data_description.r_entity: Entity providing the Red channel value.
data_description.g_entity: Entity providing the Green channel value.
data_description.b_entity: Entity providing the Blue channel value.

data_description.mireds_entity: Entity providing color temperature in mireds.
data_description.kelvin_entity: Entity providing color temperature in Kelvin.

error.require_one_temp_source: Please select either a Mireds or Kelvin entity.
error.invalid_source_camera: Please select a valid camera entity or leave blank.
